name: Mario Forever Remake
summary: Mario Forever Remake, as the name may imply, is just a complete remake of the famous Buziol Games’ Super Mario Bros. fan game “Mario Forever“, although its main elements differ it from the original and it features more custom content. Mario Forever Remake contains a bunch of never-before-seen additional worlds, like my long-living Letter Worlds Series, or Crist’s Minus Worlds. The game is based on the original Mario Forever versions that are between 2.16 and 4.4, with some little features from 5.0 and 5.9.
